April 18, 1949 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Second Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-of-leicester-brass-band-festival-2nd-section
Recollections of Beethoven [arr. Greenwood]
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £25, 2nd £15, 3rd £10, 4th £7. 22nd annual contest. 14 bands competed.
Nov. 5, 2013, 1:39 p.m. Feb. 27, 2019, 2:56 p.m.
1 Derby Borough Police Gerald Storer
2 Kent's Works (Luton) George Crossland
3 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band John W. Newton
4 Bedford Trades A. Doyle
4 Stocksbridge Old Prize James Thompson
